refnamediv.refpurpose: Tool for operating on configured PKCS#11 modules

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: p11-kit is a command line tool that can be used to perform operations on PKCS#11 modules configured on the system.
See the various sub commands below. The following global options can be used:

listitem.para: Run in verbose mode with debug output.
Run in quiet mode without warning or failure messages.

refsect1.title: List Modules
refsect1.para: The modules, information about them and the tokens present in the PKCS#11 modules will be displayed.

refsect1.title: Bugs
refsect1.para: Please send bug reports to either the distribution bug tracker or the upstream bug tracker at https://bugs.freedesktop.org/enter_bug.cgi?product=p11-glue&component=p11-kit.

refsect1.title: See also
refsect1.para: Further details available in the p11-kit online documentation at http://p11-glue.freedesktop.org/doc/p11-kit/.
